name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman2;Ohhh, if only I could see that one man again...
speak;Eirika;What did this man look like?
speak;Woman2;Oh he had the most beautiful red hair!|He has such a stylish hat!|Looked so rough, but so regal!
speak;Woman2;Oh, only if we had an arena here...|He said he was looking for one.|Said something about needing some money to pay off a debt.
speak;Woman2;Yeah, said the elixir he gave me was gonna pay it off.|But he told me to give to someone else in need instead.
speak;Woman2;Ohhhh, I want to see him again!|Please come back soon!
